today i have the pleasure of attending
to mrs maria garcia
a 38 year old hispanic female who's
brought to st
john medical center's emergency room by
ambulance after being involved in a
motor vehicle collision
approximately 45 minutes ago she was
later joined by her adult daughter
olivia the patient states that she was
restrained by her seatbelt
and that her airbag deployed she has
some mild pain on the left side of her
neck
as well as in her lower abdomen she has
a temperature of 98.2 degrees fahrenheit
and a blood pressure of 129 over 84.
the patient was then given a dose of
1000 milligrams of tylenol here in the
emergency room
to treat her pain after a cd scan was
ordered
and has come back normal the patient is
currently in stable condition
she will be discharged for the
instructions to return to the emergency
room if her pain increases
or if she has an increase in abdominal
pain nausea
or vomiting the patient has been given a
prescription
for vicodin and flexural to use for her
muscular pain
